scripts.build-web: browserify src/index.js -o dist/jscad-full.min.js -g uglifyify -p common-shakeify --standalone makeJscad
scripts.build-umd: browserify --standalone openjscad src/ui/umd.js -o dist/openjscad.umd.js -t [babelify browserify minifyify]
scripts.preversion: npm run build-all && git add dist
scripts.release-patch: git checkout master && git pull origin master && npm version patch
scripts.release-minor: git checkout master && git pull origin master && npm version minor
scripts.release-major: git checkout master && git pull origin master && npm version major
scripts.postinstall: node postInstall.js && node -e "console.log('\u001b[35m\u001b[1mLove OpenJSCAD? You can now donate to our open collective:\u001b[22m\u001b[39m\n > \u001b[34mhttps://opencollective.com/openjscad/donate\u001b[0m')"
